productAttributes.productDescription: HAIR Styler is a new hair styling tool that straightens, polishes and styles hair by means of a rotating heated cylinder and brush bristles. The secret to the Styler iron lies in its rotating heated polishing cylinder, along with four rows of precision-aligned bristles. Here's how it works: when you run the In Styler rotating hot iron through your hair, the first set of bristles gently sort and separate your hair strands. Then the rotating heated polishing cylinder gently glides over your hair, smoothly polishing, straightening, and styling each strand. Finally, the second set of bristles puts the finishing touch on your hair, leaving you with shiny, silky, hair! Because of the In Styler rotating hot iron's design, your hair won't get smashed and baked by the super-intense heat of a flat iron or other hot tools. In fact, the In Styler rotating hot iron uses less heat than traditional hot tools, and delivers better results.
productAttributes.title: Masanima Instyler Hair Curler

productAttributes.productDescription:
Featuring a sleek new design with an ergonomic body, this D5010 Hair Dryer from Remington promises faster drying and professional salon styling experience. Flaunt your tresses dried and styled with the help of this amazing hair dryer. 

Uses Concentrator

This handy styling tool comes with a concentrator that spreads the heat on one area and cools the hair at a faster rate so that you can create different hair styles.

2 Speed Settings

Stylish and comfortable to use, this hair dryer comes with two speed settings to ensure careful and quick drying without damaging your hair.

3 Heat Settings

Also, the Remington D5010 Hair Dryer features 3 heat settings which can be used to create three different heat flow levels according to your preference.

Ionic Function

The ionic function feature makes sure that your hair is soft and smooth with frizz-free shine by reducing the amount of static electricity formed in your hair.

Ceramic Tourmaline Grille

In addition, this hair dryer comes with a Ceramic Tourmaline Grille that ensures even heat distribution and fast drying.

Removable Easy Clean Rear Grille 

Also, this super sleek Remington D5010 Hair Dryer comes with a rear grille which can be easily removed and cleaned with a soft brush to maintain its prolonged motor life and performance.  

Tangle-free 1.8 m Cord

The tangle-free cord is 1.8 m long which can be plugged into any switchboard to enjoy a safe and comfortable styling experience.
productAttributes.title: Remington D5010 Hair Dryer

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Remington D2011 Luxe Compact Hair Dryer is an efficient hair dryer for your daily styling. The ion generator in the Remington hair dryer distributes heat evenly and reduces the static electricity build-up in the hair, making it healthier and smoother.

The super slim concentrator of the Remington hair dryer has a narrow end which is perfect for precision styling and quick drying. If you want extra volume, then use the diffuser on the Remington Luxe Compact hair dryer that spreads the hot air to dry your hair slowly. The True Cold Shot on the Remington D2011 locks the style you create while drying.

Body

 The Remington Luxe Compact has a slim body and a comfortable handle with a strong grip. The removable rear grille of this hair dryer helps in easy cleaning and maintenance. The ceramic tourmaline coating on the grille of the D2011 evenly produces the heat for a frizz-free shine. You can store the hair dryer when not in use, with the help of the hang-up-loop on this Remington styling product. The power cord on the Remington Luxe Compact measures 3 m.

Features

 The 3 heat settings of the Remington D2011 hair dryer allow you to set different levels of heat intensity depending on how damp your hair is. You can quickly create any style with the help of the 2 speed settings of the Luxe Compact hair dryer. The AC motor in the Remington hair dryer has long life and is maintenance-free.

The maximum power consumption of the D2011 hair dryer is 2000 W. It is preferred to use a hair dryer with high power wattage for a proficient drying experience. The range of voltage required for this hair dryer to function smoothly is 220 - 240 V. The Remington Luxe Compact hair dryer is a perfect beauty product for salon-like drying results.
productAttributes.title: Remington D2011 Hair Dryer

productAttributes.productDescription: The babyliss turbo power 2200 hairdryer has a powerful 2200w airflow for ultra fast drying. It releases a stream of balancing ions to enhance hair condition, leaving it smooth, sleek and manageable, for frizz - free shine. Turbo power 2200 with three heat and two speed settings ionic technology. Many aspects of modern living, including air conditioning, contact with man-made fibres and air pollution contribute to a build-up of static electricity in the hair. Even brushing and towel drying the hair can increase these levels, causing the surface of the cuticle to become rough. Consequently, hair may have a dull appearance. Also high levels of static charge cause hair to become fly-away and difficult to style. The ion generator produces a stream of negative ions which act to neutralise the static charge, smoothing the scales on the cuticle for shiny, smooth and manageable hair. Heat settings : there are 3 heat settings and 2 speed settings plus the cool shot. Use the higher heat and higher speed settings for initial drying and use the lower heat and lower speed settings for styling and scrunch drying as the hair begins to dry, cool shot button and concentrator nozzle, use the cool shot button on warm hair to rapidly cool the hair and set the style in place for a long, lasting effect. Use the slim concentrator nozzle to direct the airflow along the hair section, to make styling easier. Styling tips : body and volume to help create extra body and volume in the hair, lean forward so the head is upside down when drying. Direct the airflow towards the roots for maximum lift. When the hair is dry, brush back into required style. Straightening : to create a smooth straight look, first divide the hair into sections. Attach the slim concentrator nozzle, then using a brush, hold the hair taut and roll the ends under slightly whilst drying. Making waves : to create tousled natural-looking waves, position the head upside down. Using the dryer without the nozzle, grasp the hair at the roots and scrunch between fingertips whilst drying. When the hair is dry, style into position for a casual, natural look.
productAttributes.title: Babyliss Turbo BA-5567U Hair Dryer Black

productAttributes.productDescription: 2100 W hair dryer. Ionic conditioning with 90 per cent more ions. Ceramic-Tourmaline grille for anti-static and even heat. Three heat/two speed settings with a true cold shot.

productAttributes.productDescription: For glamorous hair on the go, this compact travel dryer packs a punch for its size with an impressive 1400 Watt power. The D2400 hairdryer is so easy to use, simply choose from the 2 heat settings, select one of the two different speed options and get styling. Calling all jet setters. If you are crying out for the perfect travelling companion to keep your tresses in check whilst away on business or play, then look no further - the new Travel Dryer 1400 dryer is super lightweight. No more holiday hair mares. The D2400/50D comes with a concentrator nozzle for precision styling. Concentrators are great for achieving shine too - when drying your hair make sure you point the concentrator nozzle down the hair shaft as this means your hair?s cuticles will lie flat and look oh-so glossy. To ensure compact storage and hassle free packing this handy travel dryer has a folding handle, allowing you extra space for the rest of your luggage. It also has a generous 1.8m cord enabling you to dry wherever you fancy and not to forget the convenient hang-up loop which is perfect when you want to store your travel dryer away. For gorgeous hair on the go, this dinky little travel dryer is the perfect companion. It's easy to use with 2 heat settings and a nifty folding handle to neatly store away when you're done.
productAttributes.title: Remington Travel RE-D2400/50D Hair Dryer Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Corioliss i-Red Infrared Ionic Hairdryer is a styling revolution with an 1800 Watts Powerful Professional AC Motor. It features an integrated ion generator to add super shine to your hair. With the Far Infrared Heat technology you can dry your hair faster and safer. It is like a treat for your hair during the blowdry. With the Rigorous Velocity Mechanism you see visibly faster and quicker blowdrying results. 2-Speed and 3-Temperature control settings give you all the styling and blowdrying control and flexibility you need. The Corioliss i-Red is an 1800W Professioanl Hair Dryer with visible infrared mechanism. Alongwith a super powerful high-velocity 1800Watts professional lightweight AC motor, the Corioliss i-Red has a 100% ceramic ion generator for super-fast drying and giving you gorgeus silky hair that looks and feel so healthy that it shines with health. Consumer hair dryers work on a DC motor which is not as powerful and as robust as an AC motor. An AC motor is extremely sturdy, powerful, and long-lasting. That's why professional dryers work on AC motors only. The integrated ion-generator leaves your hair healthy and shiny after every blowdry. The ion-generator also reduces frizz and fly-away hair giving you well-settled and stable blowdrying results every time. It protects your hair from the damage caused by excessive heat. The Corioliss i-Red comes with two-speed, three-temperature settings. With a combination of temperature and speed settings you can get 6 styling combinations. With real professional cool shot you can effortlessly set and settle the hair style after your blowdry. Consumer dryers do not have a real cool shot and keep throwing warm air even after the coolshot button is pressed. Special fibre-plastic concentrator nozzles allow you to get that quick, concentrated, and rigorous air blasts. Unlike conventional professional dryers the Corioliss i-Red has an infrared switch to switch on the infrared treatment which means you use the infrared feature when you need. Inspite of all the super-powerful professional features, the Coriolissimo is packed in an ergonomic, sleek and compact black soft-touch body which is extremely easy to hold, use, manoeuvre and style as you wish. The 2.6 meter professional grade power-cord gives you all the flexibilty you need at home anyday, anytime. With a special removable and washable rear-filter, Corioliss i-Red is extremely easy on maintenance and upkeep. For best results always clear and clean the rear-filter regularly. Do not wrap the power cord on the dryer and take care of it like your favourite toy and it will last you a lifetime. Grab the Corioliss i-Red and get the infrared blowdrying difference at your finger tips.
productAttributes.title: Corioliss Infrared Ionic Powerful AC Motor Professional IRed Hair Dryer Black

productAttributes.productDescription: Keep your hair shiny with the Turbo Shine hair dryer. From top to bottom, the Turbo Shine hair dryer looks professional. And it performs just the same. Manufactured by BaByliss, manufacturers of hair care appliances, this powerful 2000 W hair dryer delivers salon quality performance and results. And thanks to the built-in ionic conditioning system, the Turbo Shine gives your hair a healthy frizz-free shine that will last all day. Ionic conditioning system for a frizz-free high shine finish, Drying your hair with a powerful hair dryer can often leave your hair frizzy and full of static. That's why the Turbo Shine hair dryer features built-in ionic conditioning technology that enhances the look, feel and health of your hair. It is an ideal way to condition your hair, leaving it silky, smooth and shiny. There are no messy liquids or harmful chemicals. It is simple hair science. When you are drying your hair using the Turbo Shine hair dryer, it releases a constant stream of balancing ions. These enhance the condition of your hair and eliminate frizz, giving you healthy looking hair that is easy to style. Versatile settings and a concentrator nozzle for total control. This professional grade hair dryer is also versatile. It features two speed settings and two heat settings, including a cool shot button for setting your style. Along with the built in control settings, the Turbo Shine hair dryer comes with a salon style slim concentrator nozzle that is ideal for straightening or styling hair with a brush. Use the professional concentrator nozzle for directing the air just where you want it. Styling tips, Body and volume: To help create extra body and volume in the hair, lean forward so the head is upside down when drying. Direct the airflow towards the roots for maximum lift. When hair is dry brush it back into required style. Straightening: To create a smooth straight look, first divide the hair into sections. Attach the ultra slim concentrator nozzle then using a brush hold hair taut and roll ends slightly under as you dry. General care and maintenance: Ensure the appliance is switched off, unplugged and cool. Using a soft brush, clean any hair and other debris from the filter. Replace the rear filter by pushing back into position. To clean the outside of the hairdryer, wipe with a damp cloth. Make sure that no water enters the hairdryer and the hairdryer is completely dry before use. BaByliss - manufacturer of hair care appliances. BaByliss is manufacturer of electrical personal care appliances from hair dryers, straighteners, tongs, hair clippers and trimmers, to beauty appliances and bath spas. BaByliss Products are used in hair and beauty salons and use this expertise to create top performance products for use at home. All BaByliss Products are thoroughly tested to give the ideal performance and results possible. Manufactured by Babyliss UK.
productAttributes.title: Babyliss Turbo Shine BA-5116U Hair Dryer Black

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Remington D5005 Compact Diffuser is a hair dryer specially designed for all the women who crave for luxurious hair. With the Remington hair dryer, you not only achieve gorgeous hair but also will get a chance to be kind on the environment. Just press the eco switch to save energy during your hair drying sessions.

You can create your own hair styles every day with the Remington hair dryer. The cool shot feature on this Compact Diffuser hair dryer seals the shine and holds the style you create. Just press and hold the cool shot button and help the dryer to produce a blast of cold air and gives you a break from the constant heat flow.

Body

 The body of the Remington hair dryer is compactly designed and hence is handy to use. The ceramic tourmaline grille of the Remington D5005 dryer gives out an even heat by quickly drying your tresses. This grille is easily removable for cleaning purposes. You can use the hang-up loop on the Remington hair dryer to conveniently store the dryer when not in use. The power cord of the D5005 hair dryer is 1.8 m in length and is tangle-free.

Features

 The concentrator nozzle of the D5005 hair dryer focuses the flow of hot air in one direction by quickly drying a particular area. You can do precision styling and conveniently dry the thick locks with the help of this concentrator of the Remington Compact Diffuser hair dryer. Using a hair brush along with the concentrator helps you in achieving best styling results.

The diffuser on the Remington hair dryer spreads the hot air evenly giving you relatively a slower hair drying experience. The diffuser helps you to accomplish smooth and frizz-free hair. You can also get that extra volume and shape for your hair with the help of the diffuser. Do not use the hair dryer near the bathtubs, showers, basins or any other container having water or other liquids in it.

Featured with 3 heat settings, the Remington hair dryer allows you to select a heat intensity of your choice depending on how damp your hair is. The Remington Compact Diffuser features 2 speed settings for you to switch between. The power consumption of the Remington D5005 hair dryer is 2000 W for optimal performance. The range of voltage required for the hair dryer to function smoothly is 220 - 240 V. The Remington D50005 Compact Diffuser is an appropriate choice for women who want to experiment with new hairdos every day.

productAttributes.productDescription:
Beautiful looking hair is what every woman craves for. You can get the kind of hair you desire with the Babyliss D110E hair dryer. Everyday create new hairstyles with the Babyliss hair dryer. The cool air setting of the hair dryer locks the shine of your hair and holds the style you create. The cool air setting also gives you a break from the continuous flow of heat with a blast of cold air.

With 60 kmph of air flow speed, the Babyliss D110E hair dryer helps you to blow dry your hair quickly leaving behind smooth and damage-free hair. The concentrator in the Babyliss D110E has a narrow end and focuses the air flow in one direction. You can use the concentrator to set your thick hair after every shower. This concentrator is best suited straight hair type.

Body

 The ergonomic design of the body of the Babyliss hair dryer is appealing and is compactly packed. The hand grip of the hair dryer allows you to use the dryer comfortably during extended hair drying sessions. The dimensions of the Babyliss D110E hair dryer are 410 x 320 x 260 mm and the dryer weighs 670 g for easy portability. The power cord of the Babyliss hair dryer measures 1.8 m and is tangle-free.

Features

 Featured with 3 speed settings, the Babyliss beauty product lets you choose a suitable speed level according to your requirement. You can select a higher speed level if you are in a hurry to work and a lower speed level for a relaxed hair drying experience. The 3 heat settings on the Babyliss D110E hair dryer help you to select an appropriate heat intensity depending on how damp your hair is.

The Babyliss hair drying product consumes a maximum power of 1600 W for a better performance. It is preferred to use a hair dryer with high power wattage for fast heating. The range of voltage required for the hair dryer to operate smoothly is 220 - 240 V. The Babyliss D110E is the right choice for all the fashion-conscious women.
productAttributes.title: Babyliss D110E Hair Dryer

productAttributes.productDescription:
The Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer is a perfect combination of efficiency and performance. You can create your own style with the help of Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer. The thin concentrator nozzle on the Babyliss hair dryer focuses the flow of air in one area making your hair smoother. The concentrator end measures 10 mm in width and helps in drying your hair quickly.

This Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer delivers optimum performance with an air flow speed of 75 kmph. The asymmetric diffuser that comes with the Babyliss hair dryer distributes the air flow for frizz-free hair. This Babyliss styling product adds volume to your hair making it silky. The Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer features a Cool-air button that produces a blast of cold air to lock the style you create.

Body

 As the hair dryer has to be maintained well, the Babyliss D121E/D221E features a Swing-out rear filter with hinges that can be easily swayed open to clean. This classy Babyliss hair dryer measures 320 x 475 x 295 mm and weighs 870 g for easy portability. This Babyliss beauty product has a tangle-free power cord that measures 1.8 m for your convenience. The Hanging loop of the Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer helps you to store the dryer when not in use.

Features

 The 3 speed settings on the Babyliss hair dryer let you choose the level of speed according to your requirements. Higher speed can be opted if you are in a hurry, and a lower speed for a slow and soothing effect. Featured with 3 heat settings, the Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer allows you to select different levels of heat intensities depending on how damp your hair is.

The maximum power consumption of the Babyliss hair dryer is 1500 W for an improved performance. The range of voltage required for the Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer to function smoothly is 220 - 240 V. The Babyliss D121E/D221E hair dryer sets your hair with a professional touch, leaving hair that is healthy and shiny.
